title: Launcher having issues.
body:
Hey guys,

When I launch League Of Legends, the play button is not appearing, as well as all the articles which are normally hyperlinked below it, I only have a black box with 'league of legends' in the top left corner, and 'riot games' in the bottom right.

Anyone had this problem know of a fix?

Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=G0lElqOP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-02T01:16:02.621+0000)
>
> Are you on a Mac?

Hey Horse,

Nah I am not on a mac, but I am still finding I have this issue. it works at times. but mainly when I start my pc I have to open/close launcher about 5-10 times to get it to lunch.

any ideas?

Hm. I presume you aren't able to attempt a repair while the patcher is like that. Could you try repairing it when you've actually gotten it to work?

Do you have any firewalls/anti-viruses enabled? Try running the patcher with those turned off.
